nodes.text: Cape Regret was a small town in Lamaredd, far away from the capital Bartyn's Landing. People from Cape Regret sometimes traveled to Bartyn's Landing, which was "the big city" for them.

Cape Regret had a port and also received traffic. C. 69 BBY, the fugitive Byrch Dyshkava escape from the local jail of Bartyn's Landing and intended to go to either Cape Regret or Farsands, another city of Lamaredd. Later, c. 29 BBY, the procuress Miss Mylla wanted to send a cargo, really a young Human courtesan, to Cape Regret. This woman, who aimed to leave her current career with Mylla's blessing, was to meet one of Mylla's business contacts in Cape Regret.
The dockmaster Howe Walwahd, who lived in Bartyn's Landing, had a cousin operating a freelance trawler in Cape Regret.
